summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent thanking an unnamed recipient for information regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts and requesting contact information for Scott Borgerson. The document is part of the FBI's investigation into child exploitation and human trafficking.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses intelligence about her whereabouts, indicating she was being sought by law enforcement.

persons.name: Scott Borgerson
persons.context: The FBI agent asks if the recipient has a phone number for him, suggesting he may have information relevant to locating Maxwell.

connections.description: The FBI's inquiry about Borgerson's contact information in the context of locating Maxwell suggests a possible association or that he may have knowledge of her.

events.title: FBI inquiry regarding Maxwell whereabouts
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends an email following up on intelligence about Ghislaine Maxwell's location and requests contact information for Scott Borgerson.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking intelligence on Ghislaine Maxwell's whereabouts in September 2019.
The FBI agent was interested in contacting Scott Borgerson, suggesting he was a person of interest or had relevant information.
The document is explicitly related to the FBI's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force investigation.
The document is subject to a protective order, indicating sensitive law enforcement information.
